description: Try our easy to follow Vegetarian Kofta With Tomato Salad & Hummus recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Vegetarian Kofta With Tomato Salad & Hummus Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Combine red onion, 1 tbs lemon juice and a pinch of salt in a small bowl and set aside.

Combine mince, grated onion, half the garlic, 2 tsp cumin, ground coriander, cinnamon and herbs, reserving 1 tbs of each, in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper and mix together well. Using 1/4 cup of the mixture for each kofte, shape around 8 metal skewers.
Heat a grill pan or barbecue over medium-high heat. Brush kofte with olive oil and cook, turning often, for 10 minutes or until cooked through.
Meanwhile, process chickpeas, tahini, plus remaining garlic, lemon juice, cumin and 1/3 cup water in a small food processor until smooth. Transfer to a bowl.
Stir extra virgin olive oil, vinegar, sumac, reserved herbs and tomato into onion mixture.
Serve kofte with salad, hummus and pita.
